attributes.action: No return to school for children In September 2020 until Covid-19 is no more
attributes.additional_details: Parents are still unsure and are not liking the fact they have to send children back to school in September when Covid-19 is still around and cases are rising. How about Zoom meetings with teachers teaching 3 hours a day. It is also the best way for our children to remain safe and also able to learn at the same time and not effecting there education, or even spreading the virus to venerable people. Once the virus is no longer a threat, Review, and let the children return to school in April 2021.
attributes.background:
Instead of putting our children and others at risk and sending them back to school in September 2020 why not make it that the children can learn from teachers through a Zoom call.
Make the subscription free for schools that way the teachers are still teaching Our children without the fear of Covid.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Halt the reopening of schools until the NEU's 5 tests are met: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321101

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292  

Delay opening of schools until Test Track and Trace for Covid 19 is working: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320891
